isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - 12/06/1994 and After - OPERATION - DEFROST

svcproc.title: DEFROST
svcproc.para: To obtain maximum defrosting, place the AIR OUTLET knob on DEF and adjust the TEMPERATURE CONTROL knob for the desired degree of heat. Adjust the fan speed to provide the desired air flow.

To clear the system of humid air, operate blowers for 30 seconds at HI speed before moving the air outlet selector knob to the DEF position. This will minimize rapid fogging of the glass which can occur if humid air is blown onto a cold windshield.
To improve defroster efficiency, remove ice and/or snow from the windshield.
